overview:
Sr. IT Manager (Infrastructure Architecture) at Capital One

Over 24 years total progressive IT experience working in both large structured environments and small internet startups.

Specialties Architecting an infrastructure for websites and corporations, Security polices and design, IT/OPS budgeting, IT/OPS management, Planning IT projects, Managing co-location operations, Network & Systems Security, Business Impact Analysis, Regulatory Adherence, Data Integrity/Recovery, Disaster Recovery Planning, Cost Benefits Analysis, Website Analytics
